docs.title: ⚔️ AOT:R Regiment Wiki
docs.text:
Welcome to the official wiki for our Regiments in Attack on Titan: Revolution (AOT:R) on Roblox.

This space is built for players who want to go beyond casual — those aiming to master the game, contribute to a skilled community, and become known for their discipline and performance.

docs.title: 📌 What This Wiki Covers
docs.text:
• 🛡️ Main Regiment For players who push themselves to the limit. Strict entry requirements, elite standards.

  • 🎯 Junior Regiment A buffer and entry-level group for training and growth. No requirements to join.

  • 📖 Guides & Tactics (coming soon) Learn routing, boss-killing, and PvE strategies that make a difference.

  • 🎥 Clips & Media (embedded directly in guide pages) Videos and screenshots showcasing skillful play, record runs, and movement tech.

docs.title: 🎮 About AOT:R Regiments
docs.text:
We operate within the Attack on Titan: Revolution community to form high-performance teams and train individuals to excel at every aspect of gameplay — whether you're slashing titans solo or coordinating in squads.

This wiki exists to: - Define the standards of our regiments - Help you reach those standards - Track guides, tests, and route optimizations - Showcase player achievements and movement clips

docs.title: 🧭 Not Sure Where to Start?
docs.text:
Start in the Junior Regiment — get in, get active, and work your way toward elite entry.

Once you're ready, aim for the Main Regiment and prove you have what it takes.

docs.title: 💬 Join the Regiment Discord
docs.text:
Want to apply, ask questions, or just hang with the squad?

👉 Click here to join our Discord

Only the dedicated rise to the top.

docs.title: Junior Regiment
docs.text:
The Junior Regiment serves as a free-to-join buffer group for players who want to be part of the community but aren't yet ready for the Main Regiment.

There are no entry requirements — anyone can join.

This is your chance to: - Learn from others - Improve your performance - Get closer to qualifying for the Main Regiment

Whether you're training up or just want to be involved, the Junior Regiment is your starting point.

docs.title: Main Regiment
docs.text:
Welcome to the Main Regiment, the elite core of players dedicated to achieving peak performance in the game.

This regiment is designed for soldiers — players who strive to push their limits, perfect their technique, and dominate the battlefield.

docs.title: 🛡️ Requirements to Join
docs.text:
To be eligible for the Main Regiment, you must complete an Outskirts run in under 2 minutes and 30 seconds, under the following conditions:

  • ❌ No Skills
  • ❌ No Talents
  • 🚫 Hoarding and Heavenly Restriction modifiers are prohibited

📱 Note: For mobile players, the requirement is adjusted to sub 3:00 under the same restrictions.

If you meet these standards, you're one of the few who have what it takes to join the Main Regiment.

Ready to prove your worth?
